info.title: MMA REST API
info.description:
MarquardtMetaAPI
API Rate Limits: 60 Requests/Minute
Document endpoint requires Office365 authentification

Caution! Some endpoints are still under heavy development. They may change format and fields or deliver static test data.

post.summary: An endpoint to upload email content with attached file.
